name: Gambit
text: Charge de Card − Action: Place 1 charge counter here. (Limit once per round). Throw de Card − Interrupt: When you play an [[ATTACK]] event, remove up to 3 charge counters from here → that event deal +1 damage for each counter removed.

name: Remy Lebeau
text: Thief Extraordinaire − Action (thwart): Exhaust Remy LeBeau and look at the top 2 cards of the encounter deck. Discard 1 of those cards → remove threat from a scheme equal to the number of boost icons ([boost]) on that card.

flavor: "I can't take that crazy Cajun anywhere!"
name: Rogue
text:
Reduce the cost to play Rogue by 1 for each charge counter on your identity.
Toughness.

name: The Thieves Guild
text: Alter-Ego Response: After you resolve your "Thief Extraordinaire" ability, exhaust The Thieves Guild → remove 1 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat from that scheme, draw 1 card.

flavor: "You want to fight wit' Gambit, eh?" −Gambit
name: Gambit's Staff
text: Hero Interrupt: When an enemy attacks, exhaust Gambit's Staff → deal 1 damage to that enemy.

flavor: Members of the Thieves Guild wear custom armor to protect themselves from assassins.
name: Gambit's Guild Armor
text: Hero Response: After Gambit defends against an attack and takes no damage, exhaust Gambit's Guild Armor → ready Gambit.

name: Charged Card
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. For this attack, If Gambit's "Throw de Card" ability removed at least: • 1 counter, this attack gains ranged. • 2 counters, this attack also gains piercing. • 3 counters, this attack also gains overkill.

flavor: "Cover your eyes, mes amis. Dis hand gon' be fire!" −Gambit
name: Royal Flush
text: Hero Action (attack): Place 1 charge counter on Gambit. Deal 0 damage to an enemy. Deal 0 damage to an enemy. Deal 0 damage to an enemy.

name: Natural Agility
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you defend against an attack, place 1 charge counter on Gambit → for each charge counter on Gambit, you get +1 DEF for that attack.

flavor: "How can I be de thief when you de one stole my heart, chére?" −Gambit
name: Creole Charmer
text: Alter-Ego Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat from that scheme, confuse the villain.

name: Molecular Acceleration
text: Hero Interrupt: When you spend this card, place 1 charge counter on Gambit.

name: Bishop
text: Response: After an enemy attacks you, place 1 energy counter here. [star]Interrupt: When Bishop attacks, remove each energy counter from him → for each counter discarded this way, he gets +2 ATK for this attack (to a maximum of +6 ATK).

flavor: "All that noise. This city is a symphony, and I'm her speaker."
name: Dazzler
text: Response: After Dazzler enters play, confuse an enemy.

name: Operative Skill
text: Uses (3 operative counters). Max 1 per player. Interrupt: When you thwart, remove 1 operative counter from here → that thwart removes 1 additional threat.

name: Breaking and Entering
text: Play only if your identity has the [[SPY]] or [[THIEF]] trait. Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme.

name: Beauty and the Thief
text: Team-Up (Gambit and Rogue). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action (attack/thwart): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. Remove 4 threat from a scheme.

name: Mutant Education
text: Play only if your identity has the [[MUTANT]] trait. Alter-Ego Action: Choose up to 2 identity-specific cards in your discard pile and shuffle them into your deck. If X-Mansion is in play, draw 1 card.

name: War Room
text: Max 1 per player. Response: After an ally attacks and defeats a minion, exhaust War Room → remove 1 threat from a scheme.

name: X-Men Instruction
text: Play only if your identity has the [[MUTANT]] trait. Alter-Ego Action: Choose up to 2 [[X-MEN]] allies in your discard pile and shuffle them into your deck. If X-Mansion is in play, draw 1 card.
